physical_appearance:The image shows a black-and-white photograph. It is rectangular and it features the Singpaore river
 along with several boats and rows of shophouses on the left hand side. Two human silhouettes can be seen rowing a smaller boat on the lower right hand side of the photograph. Numerous people can be seen walking on the street in between the boats and the shophouses.
